gcci.text: At $3.18/hr for an H100, supply is loosening yet capex remains a binding constraint as lead times compress and second-hand volumes rise.

gtpi.text: With an average input price of $1.25 per million tokens, DeepSeek's pricing is spurring an API price war that pressures margins while driving rapid efficiency gains.

gagl.text: A 120 TWh annual AI load intensifies grid strain and carbon pressure, accelerating calls for nuclear baseload and demand-shifting solutions.

aipi.text: Aggressive token pricing and capex compression signal exuberant sentiment, heightening bubble risk even as cost declines underpin durable growth.
